Malice:
 
He was a bit out of breath before, but now was bordering on torture.  His sensors told him she had stopped, and he slowed down to catch his breath a bit.  But when he found her, his spark nearly extinguished itself.  he rushed over to her, and gently picked her up.  He held her limp body to his, worry deeply etched on his faceplates, hurt very evident.  
 
"Wolfblade!  Wolfblade, speak to me!  Come on, wake up!" he said to her, hoping his pleas would work.
 
He'd personally kill whoever did this to her.  He might not act like it all the time, but he was a killer.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

As she ran, she was running her current delemma through her thought
processes.  She wanted him. She knew that. But it would possitively
kill her to make him choose. To do that would be the most dishonorable
thing she could do. To make him choose between her and another bot he
cared for so much, she would be no better than the Predicons she had
fought so many times over. No, she would not make him choose.  She let
the mech fluid tears run down her wolf face plates as she ran towards
the coordinantes that she was given for this pod they were after. 
Even though she could feel her spark break, she knew what she had to
do.  She would let him once they made it back to base.  She let her
face dry a bit as she made herself a small vow, that she would make
this last time with him rememberable for them both.

She stopped running and changed back into bot mode. He was not in
sight.  She looked around and found a rock a little bigger than her
head on the ground.  She lay down, with her head on the rock, closed
her optics and waited for him to catch up with her.  It was tough not
letting herself smile at her plan for a little bit of fun first, but
she kept a straight face as if she was asleep.  Or in this case, she
hoped he would think she was knocked out cold.


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
